reviews.text: Best beer in Asia. Best when consumed in Asia. Donât try it back at home. You will be disappointed, (or pleasantly surprised).

We were impressed with the deep-rooted natural beer flavour, and found it tasted best in a shaker. Disappointed with the claim to be a Manitoba beer but brewed in Ontario. Any beer named Catfish definitely should be brewed in Manitoba (catfish capital of the world). Canât fool a brew drinker...bring back Truth in Advertising!
